from GIFT_IN_KIND gik inner join CONSTITUENT p on gik.CONSTITUENT_ID = p.CONSTITUENT_ID left outer join EMAIL e on gik.EMAIL_ID = e.EMAIL_ID left outer join GIFT_IN_KIND_DETAIL gikd on gik.GIFT_IN_KIND_ID = gikd.GIFT_IN_KIND_ID where p.SITE_NAME = #siteName#

insert into GIFT_IN_KIND (FAIR_MARKET_VALUE, CURRENCY_CODE, DONATION_DATE, MOTIVATION_CODE, ANONYMOUS, RECOGNITION_NAME, SEND_ACKNOWLEDGMENT, ACKNOWLEDGMENT_DATE, CONSTITUENT_ID, EMAIL_ID) values (#fairMarketValue#, #currencyCode#, #donationDate#, #motivationCode#, #anonymous#, #recognitionName#, #sendAcknowledgment#, #acknowledgmentDate#, #person.id#, #selectedEmail.id#)
